name: Cactus-Spike: Global Offensive
description:
Local multiplayer cactus battle arena made for the Fall 2016 EGaDS Game Jam.

Players must impale other cactus segments to gain control of them. The first player to reach 10 segments wins the round.

Only works with controllers.

Move around and press A to extend your spike and collect your friends' cacti. When you get respawned after dying, try to fight back.
